statements: SELECT * FROM FarmActivity WHERE Date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ActivityDescription FROM FarmActivity WHERE ID = 1;
SELECT Date, ActivityDescription FROM FarmActivity WHERE DroneID = 3;
SELECT ID, Date FROM FarmActivity WHERE DroneID = 2 ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmActivity WHERE DroneID = 4 AND Date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM FarmActivity WHERE ID = 1;
SELECT Date, ActivityDescription FROM FarmActivity WHERE Date >= '2022-01-01' AND Date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM FarmActivity WHERE DroneID = 5 ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT ID, DroneID, COUNT(*) AS TotalActivities FROM FarmActivity GROUP BY ID, DroneID;
SELECT * FROM FarmActivity WHERE ActivityDescription LIKE '%planting%' ORDER BY Date ASC, ID DESC;
SELECT id, activity_type, activity_date, activity_description FROM farm_activities;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, activity_description, id FROM farm_activities;
SELECT activity_description, activity_date, id, activity_type FROM farm_activities;
SELECT * FROM farm_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Harvest' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, drone_id, image_path, capture_date FROM drone_imagery;
SELECT * FROM farm_activities WHERE activity_type='Planting' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, activity_description FROM farm_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT id, activity_type, activity_date, activity_description FROM farm_activities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT * FROM drone_imagery WHERE capture_date >= '2022-06-01' AND capture_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_id, image_path, capture_date, image_description FROM drone_imagery WHERE drone_id = 2 ORDER BY capture_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM farm_activities
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM farm_activities WHERE activity_id = 1
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM farm_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT * FROM drone_images WHERE drone_id = 3
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM drone_images ORDER BY image_date ASC
SELECT * FROM farm_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM farm_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_images WHERE image_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT d.drone_name, di.image_name FROM drones d JOIN drone_images di ON d.drone_id = di.drone_id;
SELECT activity_name, COUNT(*) FROM farm_activities GROUP BY activity_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT model, manufacturer, flight_range FROM drones WHERE max_speed > 50;
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_type FROM farm_fields ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, drone_id, image_timestamp FROM drone_images WHERE drone_id = 3;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM farm_activities WHERE field_id = 1 AND activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT model, manufacturer, flight_range FROM drones WHERE max_speed > 50 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT image_id, drone_id, image_timestamp FROM drone_images WHERE drone_id IN (SELECT drone_id FROM drones WHERE flight_range > 100);
SELECT field_name, crop_type, field_area FROM farm_fields WHERE field_area < 5000 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT activity_id, field_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM farm_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_id, drone_type, flight_range_km FROM drones WHERE flight_range_km >= 50;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM farms ORDER BY farm_name DESC;
SELECT image_date, drone_id, farm_id FROM images WHERE image_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM activities WHERE activity_name = 'Harvesting' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE drone_type = 'Quadcopter';
SELECT drone_id, drone_type, flight_range_km FROM drones WHERE max_speed_kmh > 50;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM farms WHERE farm_size_acres > 100;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT a.activity_name, a.activity_date, f.farm_name FROM activities a JOIN farms f ON a.farm_id = f.farm_id;
